snippet: Hampered by poor weather, rescue workers pressed their search on Friday off the coast of Papua New Guinea for survivors of a ferry that sank the day before.
abstract: Rescue workers search for more than 100 people still missing after a ferry sank off the coast of Papua New Guinea.
lead_paragraph: Hampered by poor weather, rescue workers pressed their search on Friday off the coast of Papua New Guinea for survivors of a ferry that sank the day before.

headline.seo: More Than 100 Missing in Papua New Guinea Ferry Sinking
headline.main: More Than 100 Missing in Papua New Guinea Ferry Sinking
headline.print_headline: Papua New Guinea: 100 Still Missing Two Days After Ferry Accident
